page.title: 13GAMES CHILDREN PLAY
page.content: {BULLDOG}At school we play Bulldog. Any large number can play. Somebody is "on" and the rest stay behind the line in the yard. The person who is "on" shouts "Bulldog" and the others try to run across the yard to the other side without getting tug. When someone is tug they are on too. Then the first person to be on names someone they are going to try and tig next time. It's hard to get past because now two people are trying to stop you. When the named person is tug then the second person to be tug chooses. The game carries on like that until everyone is caught. {ONE BOUNCE} Many can play. Everyone stands in a long line facing a wall. The first person bounces the ball against the wall and the next has to catch it. If they miss they are out.
